Gym Standard

Tools:

Working directly with the business owner, I built a responsive Shopify theme and set-up to enable his brick & mortar retail space to expand the store's reach to the web for the first time. The design remains simple, consistent with branding, and true to the purpose of showcasing carefully selected goods.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Little Wolf Coffee

Tools:

I worked with a designer at PerkyBros to develop a Shopify store that was consistent with Little Wolf Coffee's new display and merchandising materials they had created, allowing user's to engage with the same experience of their cafe while expanding this small-batch roastery's reach with eCommmerce.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Green Bunnies Kitchen

Tools:

Green Bunnies is a food delivery app to browse, purchase, and schedule delivery of organic meals from the independent Green Bunnies kitchen. I developed and designed responsive web app alongside their existing iOS app in order to expand their reach and more easily incorporate new features to fit their growth.

Tools:

  • AngularJS
  • HTML/CSS
  • Kinvey
  • Spreedly
Lot 54 Goods

Tools:

Lot 54's store was built to launch the brand with a focus on the first product release. In collaboration with the brand's designer I implemented a store that could fit cohesively around their flagship product for launch, while being future-proof as they grow their product range.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Near & Dear Fundraising

Tools:

The team at Near & Dear needed a solution for their new fundraising business connecting schools and youth associations with locally sourced products, catalyzing a niche industry with ecommerce. The site had to be able to link sales with student referrals and feature product sources.

    Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Motive Feed

Tools:

Motive Interactive's API bridge between it's marketing platform and mobile ad-network for automatic campaign distribution to clients. I lead development of administration tools for the sales team, automation of campaign creation, and multiple client-facing API versions.

    Tools:

  • PHP
  • REST APIs
  • Mysql
  • HTML/CSS
